Class Hotel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hotel

  • public class Hotel
extends java.lang.Object
    This Hotel class contains objects of GuestUser and Manager and List of of rooms and users

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hotel()
      This constructor initializes the data members of the Hotel class and creates a single default manager
